projects.title: Solana SDK
projects.description: A lightweight TypeScript SDK for Solana—simplifying wallet connections, transaction signing, and SPL token interactions.

text: A lightweight TypeScript SDK designed to simplify Solana blockchain interactions.
Features include: wallet connection management, transaction signing, SPL token operations, and reduced boilerplate code for DApp development.
Published on npm and actively maintained with focus on developer experience and reliability.

projects.title: Solana DApp
projects.description: A TypeScript web app that demonstrates how to interact with the Solana blockchain directly from the browser.

text: A demonstration TypeScript web application showcasing direct Solana blockchain interactions in the browser.
Implements wallet integration, token transfers, and transaction history display.
Serves as both a functional DApp and educational resource for Solana development.

projects.title: x402 Payment Gateway
projects.description: A secure Node.js server implementing the x402 protocol for USDC micropayments on Base Sepolia, with automated testnet token distribution.

text: A production-ready payment gateway that implements the x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) protocol using USDC on Base Sepolia testnet.
Features a robust Express middleware that verifies on-chain USDC transfers in real time, protects premium API routes, and returns detailed payment proofs.
Includes a standalone airdrop automation script that claims 0.01 USDC test tokens from Circle's faucet with retry logic, error handling, and balance verification.
Built with TypeScript, ethers.js, and native Node.js fetch — zero external HTTP dependencies, full type safety, and modular design.
